title: Just a normal day in normals
body:
I was just having a normal day in a normal game when this jarvan locked in without calling, in champ select. Ignoring it I went adc vayne. Before minions spawned I said to our jgler rengar, where is jarvan going, is he my supp?. Jarvan answered with nope so after the leash I went to laning phase. That was when jarvan started taking my minions. I wrote "dude" in the chat but he ignored me and continued on. he used his abilities and autos to take as much farm as possible (he also had ad runes and went atk dmg). After a hellish laning phase, somewhere around the 15-20 minute mark, I said in all chat to report jarvan as the experience I was having was very unpleasant. Jarvan told me to stop feeding(2/5 at the time). I said he was the one that got me behind. Our top laner nasus told us to just play. After another teamfight lost, I escaped alive (not much I could do without a botrk completed at 20 minutes). Nasus said he agreed with jarvan and told me to stop feeding and to stop being completely useless. I said jarvan got me behind and he said that if I wasn't so bad, I could easily take the cs. Jarvan joined in saying that I sucked at csing and that was the reason he was not supporting me (but mate if u wanted to support u wouldn't have locked in jarvan and went full ad anyways). I told him from the first cs he was already stealing it. Nasus said that I had true damage and I was a noob if I couldn't out cs jarvan. I told him true damage doesn't nessecarily mean that it has high damage. After we lost the game, jarvan and nasus said they'll report me for my uselessness and told me to enjoy my ban. To that I replied that jarvan got me behind and he was going full ad (vayne isn't full ad, she needs atk speed as well). Nasus then said I did so little damage and I said that's to be expected for a vayne who completes a botrk at 23 minutes. Then came a barrage of verbal harassments and then they left. I am 99 percent sure they were a duo

From champ select jarvan has never intended to play a proper game (nor notified anyone) and his duo nasus also helped him to verbally harass me. If it was a troll game once in a while, I would let it go but I just think this behaviour is unacceptable. Ruins the fun in a game. Is there any way to get riot to notice this kind of behaviour?
